Visual Effects and Composting: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Undergraduate Film & Television Admissions About the Program Course Offerings Summer Courses Showcase Internships Facilities Special Projects First Run & Festivals Calendar of Events News TSOA FTV Wiki Admin & Faculty Alumni Blog Facebook Twitter YouTube  home > Undergraduate Film & TV        Visual Effects and Composting  Animation.FMTV-UT 0041 Production 3 Credits A lecture and workshop course exploring the applications and practical creation of 2-D (green screen, color correction, morphing, etc.) and 3-D (CGI, animation, virtual sets, etc.) visual effects. Students will learn the art and technique of illusion, how to manipulate images and elements combining them seamlessly and photo-realistically, and how to use these techniques in their films. Special Effects Makeup Photo Gallery: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                               Skip to content        Special Programs What Is Special Programs? Study Abroad Summer High School Summer in New York City Programs for Visiting Students Open Arts Minors Blog Events Newsletters Videos Admin & Faculty Alumni Contact Us  home > Special Programs        Special Effects Makeup Photo Gallery   << Loading... >>  *Please Note: You are using an older browser or a browser that doesn't support the styles and javascript used in this page. This browser will not display the photo gallery correctly.                      Robert Benevides teaches Introduction to Special Effects Makeup. These are photos of some of the students' projects. This course is offered to all NYU undergraduate students during the academic year through Tisch Open Arts and all visiting students during the summer through the Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television . Read Robert Benevides' bio and visit his Instagram @rob_benevides . All photos of students' projects were taken by Rob Benevides. Check out more class photos on Instagram using the hashtag #nyufxclass.   Kanbar Institute of Film and Television Professional Work by Rob Benevides  Office of Special Programs 721 Broadway, 12th Floor New York, NY 10003  Contact us!
